meanings.definition: A device used to measure the concentration of sugar in a liquid.
meanings.sent1: The saccharimeters helped the baker check how much sugar was in the cake batter.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use saccharimeters to determine the sweetness of different fruit juices.
meanings.sent3: The saccharimeters at the factory were so busy, they started chatting about the sugar levels in the drinks.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like saccharimeters, always able to detect the sweetest treats in the room.
meanings.sent5: The saccharimeters hummed softly as they revealed the sugar content of the soda.
